name: Swapscanner
introduce: Swapscanner is a DEX aggregator on Klaytn that integrates all DEXes in the Klaytn ecosystem and guarantees optimal prices with their next-generation navigator engine. Aiming to be a one-stop platform for Klaytn DeFi’s ecosystem, Swapscanner also provides professional charting services, token dashboards and a wallet for ease of user experience.
